channel.title: What I'm up to as a MoparScape player
channel.description:
Hello my name is stone sour(My ingame name is stone). And welcome to my thread. Here I'll be telling you what I'm up to. Firstly I'm going to say this so everyone noes! I'm almost 13! So if you think I'm dumb well there's your anwser..
Well, time to talk about my server discussion. Right now I'm working on a new Hamachi server called: wh00t scape. I'm probably going to get this server to be up in around 2 days are so. Untill then I'm not giving away any Ip address or port(Sorry :eek:). I'm currently an Admin on 2 servers and a mod on 4 servers. My favorite server of all time is Conshy5 pass: dominic here's website: http://z8.invisionfree.com/Conshyscapeownz/index.php?act=idx (check it out sometime k?)
I have cool friends and I play many sports so I'm not really a young computer geek(I am sponcered in skateboarding).
*Also in this thread you guys can talk about anything you like, or you talents etc...*
I'm really looking forward to making my first ever script for SCAR. I've always been using SCAR and started using it to the point were I wanted to learn how to make my very own script(This won't happen untill around a couple weeks or months, it really depends).
------------------------------------------------------
Hope to see reply's
~Stone :cool: ~Stone :cool:

item.title: What I'm up to as a MoparScape player
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Skating On Java:

i’m 12 yet me and my dad own a skateboard company. you probally wouldn’t of heard of it because i made it like 1 month ago and sold only about 9 skateboards.

I viewed the rules on your site – they seriously make it sound more like a runescape or programming forum when it’s supposed to be about skateboarding?

Read full topic

Let’s both stop spamming this thread now.

Also, if you think saying “lel” is cool, you’re definitely below 12.
Just say “lol”, kay?[/quote]
no, bullzeye is 12,and he’s the only active 12 y.o. here, and will always be
